entry.title: World IPv6 Day (ALL DAY)
entry.content:
6 June 2024

World IPv6 Day (ALL DAY)

Abstract:
Join us for a whole day (9:00 AM - 3:30 PM All times are Local time ) of sessions highlighting IPv6 within AWS networking. We'll have a mix of Guest Speakers, white boarding, a hands-on workshop, and presentations
entry.summary: 6 June 2024 World IPv6 Day (ALL DAY) Abstract:Join us for a whole day (9:00 AM - 3:30 PM All times are Local time ) of sessions highlighting IPv6 within AWS networking. We'll have a mix of Guest Speakers, white boarding, a hands-on workshop, and presentations

entry.title: Ask Me Anything with Alex and Scott

link.title: Ask Me Anything with Alex and Scott

entry.content:
30 May 2024

Ask Me Anything with Alex and Scott

Hosts:
Alex Huides

Guests:
Scott Morrison

Abstract:
This is an ask me anything session where our audience brings their networking questions, and go over networking architectures with Alex Huides and Scott Morrison.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Getting to know Amazon VPC IP Address Manager

link.title: Getting to know Amazon VPC IP Address Manager

entry.content:
23 May 2024

Getting to know Amazon VPC IP Address Manager

Hosts:
Jamie Wenzel, Matt Lehwess

Guests:
Raunak Tibrewal, Ankit Chadha

Abstract:
Amazon VPC IP Address Manager (IPAM) is a service that simplifies IP address management. This service helps you plan, track, allocate and monitor your IP adddresses in a unified operational view across your AWS environment. Join us for a service overview, and live demonstration
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Streamlining Your Network: AWS Cloud WAN and Cisco SD-WAN Integration

link.title: Streamlining Your Network: AWS Cloud WAN and Cisco SD-WAN Integration

entry.content:
23 May 2024

Streamlining Your Network: AWS Cloud WAN and Cisco SD-WAN Integration

Hosts:
Matt Lehwess, Jamie Wenzel

Guests:
AWS & Cisco

Abstract:
Join our session with experts from AWS and Cisco as they walk you through the integration of AWS Cloud WAN with Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN. Learn about each solution, discover how they work together, and see how you can manage AWS Cloud WAN using Cisco SD-WAN. We'll also include a live demo.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Approaching security and identity with cloud networking

link.title: Approaching security and identity with cloud networking

entry.content:
9 May 2024

Approaching security and identity with cloud networking

Hosts:
Jamie Wenzel

Guests:
Everett Hinckley, Principal Security Consultant

Abstract:
In this session we talk about security from a wholistic approach as opposed to configurations on individual services. We will discuss best practices on how to plan, create and manage your security and identity, And what it means and looks like in practice.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Direct Connect and Hybrid Connectivity with Equinix

link.title: Direct Connect and Hybrid Connectivity with Equinix

entry.content:
2 May 2024

Direct Connect and Hybrid Connectivity with Equinix

Hosts:
Riggs Goodman III

Guests:
Equinix Team

Abstract:
Equinix is joining us for the Routing Loop this week. In this session, we will dive deep into the capabilities Equinix provides as a AWS Direct Connect partner to provide connectivity for hybrid workloads. In addition, we will have the Direct Connect Product Manager with us to discuss new capabilities we recently launched with DX
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Securing your applications against web threats with AWS WAF

link.title: Securing your applications against web threats with AWS WAF

entry.content:
24 April 2024

Securing your applications against web threats with AWS WAF

Hosts:
Sidhartha Chauhan

Guests:
Oleksandr Golovatyi, Sr Technical Account Manager
Sagar Desarda, US Tech Leader, Edge-Services

Abstract:
AWS WAF provides a multitude of capabilities for protecting your internet-facing applications. In this session, learn how applications fronted by Amazon CloudFront, Application Load Balancer, Amazon API Gateway, and other AWS services can be protected through seamless integration with AWS WAF. Get additional insights into AWS WAF configuration best practices to help secure your application at an optimal cost.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Ingress inspection architectures on AWS
entry.content:
18 April 2024

Ingress inspection architectures on AWS

Hosts:
Alex Huides

Guests:
Tom Adamski, Principal SA, Networking

Abstract:
Join to learn about different firewall deployments for your Internet facing applications. We'll cover network inspection basics and patterns for deployment of AWS WAF, AWS Network Firewall and 3rd party appliances. Expect a demo - time permitting.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Network Security Protections for LLMs
entry.content:
11 April 2024

Network Security Protections for LLMs

Hosts:
Riggs Goodman III

Guests:
Adam Boeglin, Principal SA, ML Infrastructure
Alan Erdley, Principal Edge GTM Specialist
EJ Chen, Sr Solutions Architect, Edge
Justin Kurpius, Sr Edge Specialist

Abstract:
Large Language Models are top of mind for many customers of AWS with the development of Gen AI applications. However, managing the applications applications against unwanted traffic can result in increased costs. In this Routing Loop Session, we will dive into the affects of bot traffic on LLM applications, the impact to costs, and how you can provide network layer security capabilities using AWS WAF and Amazon CloudFront to mitigate this traffic. At the end, we will dive into the different AWS chipsets that support these workloads, including AWS Trainium and AWS Inferentia.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions

entry.title: Egress inspection architectures with AWS Network Firewall

link.title: Egress inspection architectures with AWS Network Firewall

entry.content:
4 April 2024

Egress inspection architectures with AWS Network Firewall

Hosts:
Tom Adamski

Guests:

Abstract:
Join to learn about egress network deployment models with AWS Network Firewall and how to control TLS encrypted traffic. Session will include a hands-on demo of ANF TLS inspection capabilities.
Session Feedback/Content Suggestions
